Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the toss and opted to bowl first.
India completed the clean sweep with a 3-0 series win.
Washington Sundar was named Man of the Match.
Suryakumar Yadav was named Player of the Series.
Sri Lanka needed 3 runs to win the Super Over but lost by 2 wickets.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and chose to bowl first.
India's squad includes Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Rishabh Pant (WK), Riyan Parag, Rinku Singh, Axar Patel, Ravi Bishnoi, Arshdeep Singh, Mohammed Siraj.

Sri Lanka's squad includes Pathum Nissanka, Kusal Mendis (WK), Kusal Perera, Kamindu Mendis, Charith Asalanka (c), Dasun Shanaka, Wanindu Hasaranga, Ramesh Mendis, Maheesh Theekshana, Matheesha Pathirana, Asitha Fernando.
Post-Match Reflections: India won the 3rd T20I and completed the clean sweep with a 3-0 series win.
Sri Lanka turned up better with the ball but the Indian batsmen batted sensibly on a difficult pitch.
The Indian lower order managed to save the game and won the Super Over.
Sri Lanka's lower middle order and middle order were disappointed with their batting.
India's players expressed satisfaction with their performance and the clean sweep win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will start on Tuesday, 30 July 2024, at 7:00 PM (IST).
The Super Over was won by India by 2 wickets.
Riyen Parag expressed disappointment for not batting through and felt he could have contributed more.
Sri Lanka's team will have to improve their batting, especially the middle and lower middle order.
India's team will look forward to the upcoming ODI series and the performance of their players.
